data.lyric:
[ti:Take It From Me]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Home State]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Take It From Me - Jordan Davis
[00:03.73]Lyrics by：Jordan Davis/Jason Gantt/Jacob Davis
[00:07.47]Composed by：Jordan Davis/Jason Gantt/Jacob Davis
[00:11.20]I think me and you should blow this off
[00:16.21]So much for the after-party let's tell everybody we got lost
[00:21.06]I think me and you should do our own thing
[00:26.46]Our own way at my place far away
[00:29.78]Take it from me if you want a t-shirt to sleep in
[00:32.98]It's my favorite but you can keep it
[00:35.53]Looks good baby you should leave it
[00:37.44]Hanging off your shoulders
[00:39.08]Now give them bare feet dancing down the hallway
[00:41.82]Smiling at me running your finger down the wall
[00:44.24]You know what I want I got what you need
[00:47.84]Take it from me
[00:59.26]Baby you should stop right now right here
[01:04.31]Right where we wanna be
[01:06.02]I'll spin you around and let's just see
[01:08.99]Where this thing goes
[01:11.50]All I know is that I'm all yours all night
[01:15.85]I've got nothing but time
[01:17.62]Take it from me if you want a t-shirt to sleep in
[01:21.01]It's my favorite but you can keep it
[01:23.48]Looks good baby you should leave it
[01:25.38]Hanging off your shoulders
[01:27.32]Now give them bare feet dancing down the hallway
[01:29.62]Smiling at me running your finger down the wall
[01:32.05]You know what I want I got what you need
[01:35.78]Take it from me yeah
[01:40.87]Take it from me yeah
[01:46.18]But you can steal a kiss I won't call you a thief
[01:48.80]But take it from me take take take
[01:51.29]What I got to give you can have for free
[01:53.44]Just take it from me
[01:56.19]Take it from me if you want a t-shirt to sleep in
[01:59.38]It's my favorite but you can keep it
[02:01.89]Looks good baby you should leave it
[02:03.86]Hanging off your shoulders
[02:05.95]Now give them bare feet dancing down the hallway
[02:08.09]Smiling at me running your finger down the wall
[02:10.45]You know what I want I got what you need
[02:14.20]Take it from me yeah
[02:19.22]Just take it from me yeah
[02:25.50]Take my word take my heart
[02:27.85]Take my kiss and maybe take it too far
[02:31.82]But baby take it from me
[02:33.76]Oh just take it from me
[02:35.36]To just call your anme take for me
[02:39.07]What I just you you have a free take for me
[02:43.16]Oh just take it from me yeah
data.trans:
[ti:来拿去吧]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Home State]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.73]//
[00:07.46]//
[00:11.20]我觉得我们应该取消约会
[00:16.21]再也不要参加派对了 让我们告诉所有人我们不玩了
[00:21.06]我觉得我们应该做自己的事
[00:26.46]用我们自己的方式 在我的家里 远离尘世
[00:29.78]如果你需要一件T恤当睡衣 从我这里拿吧
[00:32.98]那是我最爱的T恤 但你可以拿去
[00:35.53]你穿着真好看 宝贝 你应该把它
[00:37.44]穿在你的身上
[00:39.08]现在让我们在走廊里赤着脚翩翩起舞吧
[00:41.82]你对我微微笑 手指在墙壁上游走
[00:44.24]你知道我想要什么 我有你需要的一切
[00:47.84]来拿去吧
[00:59.26]宝贝 你应该立刻停在这里
[01:04.31]这是我们梦寐以求的时刻
[01:06.02]我会领着你转动 让我们
[01:08.99]静观其变
[01:11.50]我只知道 今晚我只属于你
[01:15.85]我除了时间一无所有
[01:17.62]如果你需要一件T恤当睡衣 从我这里拿吧
[01:21.01]那是我最爱的T恤 但你可以拿去
[01:23.48]你穿着真好看 宝贝 你应该把它
[01:25.38]穿在你的身上
[01:27.32]现在让我们在走廊里赤着脚翩翩起舞吧
[01:29.62]你对我微微笑 手指在墙壁上游走
[01:32.05]你知道我想要什么 我有你需要的一切
[01:35.78]来拿去吧
[01:40.87]来拿去吧
[01:46.18]如果你从我这里偷走一个吻 我不会叫你小偷
[01:48.80]来拿去吧 尽管拿去吧
[01:51.29]我给你的爱是无偿的
[01:53.44]只管来拿去吧
[01:56.19]如果你需要一件T恤当睡衣 从我这里拿吧
[01:59.38]那是我最爱的T恤 但你可以拿去
[02:01.89]你穿着真好看 宝贝 你应该把它
[02:03.86]穿在你的身上
[02:05.95]现在让我们在走廊里赤着脚翩翩起舞吧
[02:08.09]你对我微微笑 手指在墙壁上游走
[02:10.45]你知道我想要什么 我有你需要的一切
[02:14.20]来拿去吧
[02:19.22]只管来拿去吧
[02:25.50]拿走我的诺言 拿走我的真心
[02:27.85]拿走我的亲吻 不管多远我都陪你走
[02:31.82]宝贝 来拿去吧
[02:33.76]只管来拿去吧
[02:35.36]我在呼唤你的名字 快来拿去吧
[02:39.07]我给你的爱是无偿的
[02:43.16]只管来拿去吧
